name: Order of Scribes
desc: A wizard obsessed with living spellbooks and magical writing. High utility, flexible damage typing for spells, and exceptional ritual/casting logistics.

name: Bladesinging
desc: A melee-capable wizard who enters a bladesong for defense, speed, and concentration support. Strong gish with high skill ceiling.

name: Alchemist
desc: A support-focused artificer who creates experimental elixirs and boosts healing/acid/poison-style effects. Strong utility and party sustain.

name: Armorer
desc: A power-armor artificer with modular suit modes: one defensive/taunting, one stealth/ranged. Excellent tanking or infiltration flexibility.

name: Artillerist
desc: A turret-and-explosives artificer who deploys an eldritch cannon for damage, defense, or support. Strong ranged pressure and team shielding.

name: Battle Smith
desc: A weapon-and-companion artificer with a steel defender. Solid frontline option, strong reaction defense, and Intelligence-based weapon synergy.

name: Beast
desc: Barbarians who walk the Path of the Beast draw on the feral power of wild creatures. The beast rages within you, granting you the strength and ferocity of a wild animal. You can transform into a beast, gaining the abilities and instincts of the creature you become.

name: Wild Magic
desc: A barbarian infused with chaotic magic that erupts during rage. Strong battlefield randomness with occasional party-support effects.

name: Creation
desc: Bards of the College of Creation are masters of art and music. They can weave magic into their creations, bringing them to life or infusing them with magical properties. These bards are often found in places where art and creativity flourish, and they use their magic to inspire others and create beautiful works.

name: Eloquence
desc: A persuasion powerhouse and debuff specialist. Extremely consistent social checks and strong inspiration reliability.

name: Order
desc: A law-and-command cleric who turns buffs into ally attacks and asserts battlefield authority. Excellent party force multiplier.

name: Peace
desc: A bond-focused support cleric that links allies for shared protection and accuracy. Very strong teamwork amplification.

name: Twilight
desc: A dusk-and-dawn guardian cleric with powerful party protection and anti-fear/charm support. Exceptional defensive aura play.

name: Spores
desc: Druids of the Circle of Spores find beauty in decay. They see within mold and other fungi the ability to transform lifeless material into abundant, albeit somewhat strange, life. These druids believe that life and death are parts of a grand cycle, with one leading to the other and then back again. Death isn't the end of life, but instead a change of state that sees life shift into a new form.

Druids of this circle have a complex relationship with the undead. They see death and decay as essential parts of the multiverse, yet they believe the natural cycle of death should remain free from undead influence. Unlike most druids, these mystics tap into energies normally associated with death magic, weaving fungal spores with necromantic energy to create their unique brand of druidic magic.

name: Stars
desc: The Circle of Stars allows druids to draw on the power of starlight. These druids have tracked heavenly patterns since time immemorial, discovering secrets hidden amid the constellations. By revealing and understanding these secrets, the Circle of the Stars seeks to harness the powers of the cosmos.

Many druids of this circle keep records of the constellations and the stars' effects on the world. Some groups document these observations at megalithic sites, which serve as enigmatic libraries of lore. These repositories might take the form of stone circles, pyramids, petroglyphs, and underground temples—any construction durable enough to protect the circle's secrets even against a great cataclysm.

name: Wildfire
desc: Druids within the Circle of Wildfire understand that destruction is sometimes the precursor of creation, such as when a forest fire promotes later growth. These druids bond with a primal spirit that harbors both destructive and creative power, allowing the druids to create controlled flames that burn away one thing but give life to another.

The druids of this circle are keepers of lore and creation, wielders of flame and renewal. They view fire as a force of change and transformation, capable of both destruction and rebirth. Through their bond with a wildfire spirit, these druids channel the essence of flame to protect the natural world and promote new growth from the ashes of the old.

name: Psi Warrior
desc: A psionic fighter who uses mental energy for defense, force movement, and burst damage. Great control and survivability tools.

name: Rune Knight
desc: A giant-rune empowered fighter with flexible rune-based reactions and a size-increase combat mode. Strong control and tanking.

name: Astral Self
desc: A monk who manifests an astral form to extend reach, enhance offense/defense, and gain spectral senses and presence.

name: Mercy
desc: A monk who blends healing and harm using ki. Strong battlefield medic with status application and efficient support.

name: Glory
desc: A heroic-athlete paladin built for mobility, ally buffing, and cinematic feats of strength. Great leader for aggressive teams.

name: Watchers
desc: A sentinel paladin against extraplanar threats. Strong anti-charm/fear support, initiative aura, and banishment-style control.

name: Fey Wanderer
desc: A ranger infused with fey magic: strong social presence, fear/charm manipulation, and extra psychic-style damage.

name: Swarmkeeper
desc: A ranger bonded to a mystical swarm (insects, spirits, motes). Excellent forced movement, defense, and utility options each turn.

name: Phantom
desc: Death-touched rogue who draws power from lingering souls.
Theme: Death-touched rogue. Fantasy: Spirit medium, soul collector. Primary stats: Dexterity.
Phantoms siphon life force and wield ghostly talents to spread damage and gain spectral advantages.

name: Soulknife
desc: Psionic assassin who manifests psychic blades and mental prowess.
Theme: Psionic assassin. Fantasy: Mind-blade wielder, psychic operative. Primary stats: Dexterity, Intelligence.
Soulknives replace weapons with psionic blades, thriving on stealth, mobility, and skill reliability.

name: Aberrant Mind
desc: A psionic/alien sorcerer with expanded spell options, strong telepathy, and efficient metamagic-like casting for certain spells.

name: Clockwork Soul
desc: A lawful-mechanistic sorcerer that imposes order: cancels advantage/disadvantage swings, gets strong defensive wards, and broad spell access.

name: Fathomless
desc: An ocean/abyss patron warlock with a tentacle companion, strong control, cold/water defenses, and mobility in aquatic environments.

name: Genie
desc: A genie-patron warlock with an elemental bent and a personal extradimensional vessel. Strong utility, damage riders, and travel options.

name: Bladesinging
desc: A melee-capable wizard who enters a bladesong for defense, speed, and concentration support. Strong gish with high skill ceiling.

name: Order of Scribes
desc: A wizard obsessed with living spellbooks and magical writing. High utility, flexible damage typing for spells, and exceptional ritual/casting logistics.
